moves.1. d4 Nf6 2. Bf4 d5 3. Nf3 c5 4. e3 Nc6: A blunder, since I cannot relye on my queen's protection. You'll see why,
moves.10... Rxh7 11. Qxh7 Qxb2 12. Rb1 Qxc3 13: I though maybe there will be some compensation, but no way.
moves.13... cxd4 14. Nxd4 Nxd4 15. exd4 Qxd4 1: Maybe Qh8 would have stopped him for a while.
moves.16... Bc5: I calculated up to Qf4. Not enough.
moves.17. Rb8+ Rxb8 18. Qxb8+ Ke7 19. Qf4 Qa1+: The best defence was Nb1. After QxN, the mate is farther.
moves.20... Bb5+ 21. Kf3: I was dreaming of BxB, Qc7+, recovering it with QxBc5. But my opponent saw the right one. Almost for a puzzle.
